lines.speaker: Wynn
lines.text: Ah. A visitor. Unusual. I'm Wynn — I study the Dissolved from this hut.

lines.speaker: Wynn
lines.text: You're an Architect, aren't you? I can tell by the way you look at the water.

lines.speaker: Wynn
lines.text: There's a glade south of here. Verdance's Hollow. The tree there has been pulsing stronger this past month.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.text: Welcome to the edge of the map! I'm Petra — we Ridgewalkers live here because we like watching new land form.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.text: You're the Architect from the village? Callum sent a letter ahead.

lines.speaker: Solen
lines.text: Hello, dear. I'm Solen. I've been studying the grove since I was a girl.

lines.speaker: Solen
lines.text: Take this. A Light Lens — without it, the light is too bright to approach.

lines.speaker: Preserver Scout
lines.text: Halt. This area is under preservation protocol.

lines.speaker: Preserver Scout
lines.text: We've preserved it. This tower was built by a civilization that chose to dissolve. Now it will endure forever.

lines.speaker: Preserver Agent
lines.text: This zone is under Preserver protection. Turn back, Architect.

lines.speaker: Preserver Agent
lines.text: We don't want to fight. But we will.

lines.speaker: Preserver Agent
lines.text: The Curator's will is crystal. You can shatter us, but you cannot shatter that.
